ygData.subject: Re: Wis Increasing Items (spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: ok i ve got most of that...but he left off 2 good peices from fear....the ethereal mist bp and greeves...the bp adds 15 wis, and the legs 9....so there s 24 in
ygData.messageBody:
ok i've got most of that...but he left off 2 good peices from fear....the
ethereal mist bp and greeves...the bp adds 15 wis, and the legs 9....so
there's 24 in those 2 peices.....but the problem comes in getting
those....especialy since the patch....haven't had the pleasure of entering
fear yet since, but i'm dying to <and prolly will die in there (; > plus
the purple color looks really sweet (: just my 2cp worth

(\/)ystix Spellchaser
lv 50 human cleric of The Rathe

Allison Brannen wrote:

> From: Allison Brannen <mav@...>
>
> Someone posted the following list of the 'best' wisdom/mana
> increasing items for a cleric (by inventory slot) on the internet. I
> forwarded it to my guild and titled it my wish list ;)
>
> Sorry I dont have the persons name to give full credit to. I've tried
> to notate where things come from.
>
> ******
>
> Ear Gold Jasper Earrings =3 wis *2 (from a jeweler)
>
> Face Plat Ruby Veil =7wis 7str (jeweler)
>
> Neck Chrysoberyl Talisman =3wis 20mana 
>
> Head Nightshade Wreath =Ac 1 5wis 5int 
>
> Fingers Plat Jasper Ring =6wis*2 (jeweler)
>
> Wrists Runed Mithril Bracers =(4ac 3str 5wis)*2 
>
> Shoulders Adamanite Epolets =12ac 7wis 
>
> Arms Plat Arm Band =3str 3wis 
>
> Chest BS Tunic=12ac 4agi 4wis (Undead Knight in Unrest,
> group of at least low 20s needed)
>
> Hands Dark Mail Gaunthlets =10ac 5dex 50mana 
>
> Back Mammouth Cloak =5AC 4wis 5vs. Cold 
>
> Waist Bone Clasped Gridle =4ac 7str 7sta 7dex 75 hp
> 75mana (one of the few items from the Plane of Fear
> that is NOT no drop)
>
> Legs Gatorscale Leggings =7ac 4wis 15hp (Cazic Thule?,
> group in mid to high 20s required minimum)
>
> Feet Golden Efreeti Boots =5ac 9wis 9int 
>
> Weapon Paw of Opello =9ac 5sta 9dex 9wis -5chr 5mana -
> 5sv.Disease (Quest item)
> 
> Shield Charred Gaurdian =10ac 9wis (off clockwork in
> Solusek dungeon, group of high 20's to low 30s at least
> required)
>
> Alternate weapon when actually getting into melee: 
> Gem Encrusted Scepter =5wis (from Princess in
> Mistmoore, group of 30+ required)
> 
> Ending Stats increases 
> AC 84 
> STR 23 
> STA 12 
> AGI 13 
> DEX 12 
> WIS 92 !!! 
> Int 14 
> CHAR -5 
> HP 90 
> Mana 150
>
> *****
>
> Not too shabby, huh?
>
> --Aaldiana D'Ozz
>

> High Elf
> Cleric
> Metal Babe
